body:
Hey guys, its Sevo, and in this thread Im talking creativity. You know, every one of my resource packs take about 3-4 months, unless its this quick idea. I spend hours dreaming about textures, staying awake at night (Ik I haz no lyfe) and I recently realised I have a lack of original texture ideas. So here, I need ideas for things. I will date the date and time of every texture I need ideas for, and I will provide the download afterwards. So lemme start with a simple texture:

May the second, 9:30 PM,  2015- I need a hunger bar texture. Needs to be either HD or 16x16, all I want is something that is creative and different from the chicken nuggets in default. Thanks!

replies.body: Yes, I recently finished one, and just after that I got permission to build a PC, so my new PC will be able to handle HD textures, so expect an HD texture pack in the future :3. And the pack I finished recently, planning to release it this weekend. It is by far the best resource pack Ive made.
